description: The diagnoses associated with an order template. Note that if an order template is unreleased and it has no diagnoses then it will use the plan diagnoses stored in the ASSOCIATED_DX table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to each diagnosis associated with the order template in this row.

columns.name: ASSOC_DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis (EDG) record ID of a diagnosis associated with the order template in this row.

columns.name: ASSOC_DX_DESC
columns.description: The description of a diagnosis associated with the order template in this row.

columns.name: ASSOC_DX_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment for a diagnosis associated with the order template in this row.
